results.name: Expansion of (1-4x-x^3)/(1-x+x^2)^2.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-3,2,-1).
formula: a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - 3*a(n-2) + 2*a(n-3) - a(n-4) for n > 3. - _Jinyuan Wang_, Apr 09 2020
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 15 2008
